page.title: 13Clubs
page.content:
Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts all hold meetings in Lochgelly, mainly in St. Andrew's Church Hall, but 1 Brownie Pack meets in St. Patrick's School.
9 _ 14 year olds can become members of the Lochgelly Centre { {Junior Club},which meets every week-day after school.
The{"Peewit Club"}is organised by the Park Rangers in Lochore Meadows Country Park.
The{"Snooker Club"}allows membership at 13 years of age and the 3 Social Clubs also have snooker tables. In these clubs, adult members can also play darts, board games, card games and dominoes.
